mapper.insert: INSERT INTO MJMEMBER (MID , MPW , MNAME , MBIRTH , MEMAIL , MADDR , MFILENAME) VALUES (#{mid} , #{mpw} , #{mname} , #{mbirth} , #{memail} , #{maddr} , #{mfilename})
mapper.select: SELECT MID , MPW , MNAME , MBIRTH , MEMAIL , MADDR , MFILENAME FROM MJMEMBER WHERE MID=#{mid}
SELECT MID FROM MJMEMBER WHERE MID=#{mid}
